data.meta_site_name: Gloria Sanders Obituary | October 12, 2020 | Jackson Funeral Service Inc. - Neptune, NJ
data.text:
Gloria “Lynn” Sanders died peacefully with family in Neptune, NJ on October 12, 2020.

Gloria (Lynn) was born on December 3, 1960 in Lakewood, New Jersey to Connie Yvonne King-Holloway and Willie Marsh Sr. She graduated from Lakewood High School in 1977 and went on to receive a certification in nursing at Lexington Manor Nursing Home. When she was pursuing her certification she worked at Leisure Chateau, Fountainview, and Medi-Center. Once she received her certification she moved to Asbury Park where she met her love Eric Sanders which she married in 1999. Once settled in Asbury Park Gloria began working for King Manor Rehabilitation and Asbury Towers until she was unable to work due to heath issues. Gloria’s (Lynn) children remember her as a fun, kind, humorous, gentle, loving, patient, and well driven mother who encouraged All. She has always been a caring and passionate person who looked out for family, neighbors and whomever she came in contact with. She was generous, witty, and dedicated individual who loved Math.

She is preceded in death by her parents Connie Yvonne King-Holloway and Willie Marsh Sr. 2 Sisters Mary Marsh and Constance Holloway.

Gloria (Lynn) is survived by her husband Eric Sanders of Asbury Park, NJ; Children Lekia Holloway of Neptune NJ, Lakezia Holloway( Son-in-law Terence) of Fredrick, Maryland; Ebony Holloway of Neptune City. Sisters: Churyl Nunes of Toms River, NJ; Bobbyjoe Lewis of Manchester, NJ; Robin Holloway of Irvington, NJ; Carol Morgan of Ft. Piers, Florida; Doris Hargrove of Lakewood, NJ. Brothers Cenakey Conover of New Mexico; Jeffrey Morris of Mays Landing; Michael Holloway of Orange, NJ; Willie Marsh Jr., Dion Marsh

Celebration of Life

Gloria “Lynn” Sanders

Sunrise December 3, 1960 – Sunset October 12, 2020

Jackson Funeral Home Inc

242 Neptune Blvd

Neptune, New Jersey

Pastor Terrence Porter – Eulogist

October 24th, 2020

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Gloria Lynn Sanders, please visit our floral store.
